testcase.classname: This feature will test SkyNews.com homepage - Title, Categories and story
testcase.name: Verify Browser tab's title
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to SkyNews homepage....................................passed When User clicks 'Accept' cookies...........................................passed Then Page title should be displayed.........................................passed

testcase.classname: This feature will test SkyNews.com homepage - Title, Categories and story
testcase.name: Verify number of categories displayed and their names
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to SkyNews homepage....................................passed When User clicks 'Accept' cookies...........................................passed Then Number of categories should be displayed along with their names........passed

testcase.classname: This feature will test SkyNews.com homepage - Title, Categories and story
testcase.name: Verify default focus is on Home Category
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to SkyNews homepage....................................passed When User clicks 'Accept' cookies...........................................passed Then Home category should be selected by default............................passed

testcase.classname: This feature will test SkyNews.com homepage - Title, Categories and story
testcase.name: Verify that is the user clicks 'Climate' this becomes the focus
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to SkyNews homepage....................................passed When User clicks 'Accept' cookies...........................................passed When User clicks 'Climate' category.........................................passed Then Climate should be focussed.............................................passed

testcase.classname: This feature will test SkyNews.com homepage - Title, Categories and story
testcase.name: Select a story from homepage. Verify that a word of your choice in the title text of the article you have just selected appears once title of the new page loads
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to SkyNews homepage....................................passed When User clicks 'Accept' cookies...........................................passed When User clicks a story from homepage......................................passed Then Title text of the article selected should appear in the new page.......passed
